title: One-pan Caribbean Jerk Chicken
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 green pepper, seeded and cubed', '1 red pepper, seeded and cubed', '4 tablespoons sliced onion', '350g skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut into strips', '2 1/2 teaspoons Caribbean jerk seasoning', '125ml plum sauce', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '4 tablespoons chopped roasted peanuts']
